reviews.title: Cute
reviews.review_text: I like how comfortable they are but im not a big fan of the buttoning system it has and the color is really bright. If you like bright color shorts this is for you.

reviews.title: Not a “full coverage swim short”
reviews.review_text: Great shorts, good length, would have kept them except I thought being advertised as “full coverage swim shorts” it meant they were swim bottoms with a liner. There is no liner, and you'd need bottoms to wear under them.

reviews.title: Tight Fit
reviews.review_text: I recently received the Free Country Women's Bermuda Board Short II Pink Orchid. I ordered the XL using the size chart. Most size charts that give more than one number size for the letter size will fit that range. Not these. XL on all the tags but the sewn in tab states it is a size 16 whereas the size chart states an XL is 16 and 18. I prefer my bottoms to have some room. These shorts are fitted so every curve shows. At a 16, these fit but have no room. Anything added to the pockets would make an undesirable bulge. I will be taking them on vacation but do not have confidence that I will experience much comfort trying to put them on if I am wet. Even with 7% Spandex, there is not much give. It really is a shame that the fit is so off as these are super cute and well made.

reviews.title: Small
reviews.review_text: I'm usually a 10 and ordered a large and they were way too small like maybe a six or eight. Nice otherwise.

reviews.title: Swim short
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Long enough, quick dry, little snug, no panty inside the short.

reviews.title: Too small
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have a pair of these shorts that fit fine. These are an inch smaller in the waist.

reviews.title: I bought 2 pair of
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I bought 2 pair of the Bermuda shorts in the same size but different colors. The blue runs small. I may have to return it. A button would be much better versus the waist clip. It feels like the clip won't last very long. The material is excellent. Love the zip pockets.

reviews.title: Board shorts
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is my second pair and the fit is smaller. This doesn't create an issue but when ordering certain size should be the same. My other concern are the wrinkles. They are difficult to remove. I still have wrinkles on my first pair even after several washes and ironing. I do like the fit and how quickly fry after swimming.

reviews.title: Board shorts II vs original board short
reviews.review_text: These board shorts II do not have Velcro at the waist button which I loved on the original board shirt. That's the same. However these shorts are tapered leg openings and run smaller than the original. I wear a medium in the original with a loose fit. I ordered a medium in the newer version and while they fit they are form fitting looking because of the tapered leg. I liked them even with that so I ordered the large and they fall off. Please bring back the original board shirt.

reviews.title: I like these shorts but
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like these shorts but I ordered 2 pairs and one is tighter than the other. Same size different fit. What's that about? They fit different than last years shorts, same product. So when discussing fit you can't say true to anything.

reviews.title: Sizing is a little off.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I would typically wear medium and there's mediums were too small. I sent them back and ordered large. Received XL. Going to keep them because they actually fit. The waist band is a little big but the ties bring it in and it will work for me.

reviews.title: Smaller and Shorter than Same Short Sold in Previous Years
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I had these shorts in Size XL from several years ago and after losing weight they were falling off of me so I ordered in Size L. When they arrived, I could see they were the exact same short except very tight and few inches shorter than the previous pair. Not even sure I will be able to wear.

reviews.title: Board Short
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Ran very small in the waist. Have others the same size and style that fit perfectly so not sure why these run weird

reviews.title: Bermuda shorts
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The quality of the tops & shorts is exactly as stated in details. The only thing I had a problem with was sizing. They're actually smaller than size indicated.

reviews.title: Not a fan of the string ribbon. Adds a bulge.
reviews.review_text: Not really my style... Should have gotten a shorter one. But definitely lightweight and dries quickly. Might consider using this for biking... Love the added built-in sun protection!

reviews.title: These don't feel quit as
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These don't feel quit as nice as the previous bermuda shorts you sold.

reviews.title: Size runs way small compared
reviews.review_text: Size runs way small compared to their other swim bottoms

reviews.title: I think they run small
reviews.review_text: I think they run small compared to the other other ones I have had in the past.
